name: claude-code-templates (davila7)
description: [项目级] CLI tool for configuring and monitoring Claude Code。来源: https://github.com/davila7/claude-code-templates

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
CLI tool for configuring and monitoring Claude Code

来源: https://github.com/davila7/claude-code-templates
语言: Python
Stars: 20970

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: **[Browse All Templates](https://aitmpl.com)** - Interactive web interface to explore and install 100+ agents, commands, settings, hooks, and MCPs.
